subject: Football (College)
Mascots
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goldy Gopher has an unusual move whose inventor, Herb Bernstein, said, “You had to be able to skate and be a complete idiot, and I qualified on both counts.”
snippet: Goldy Gopher has an unusual move whose inventor, Herb Bernstein, said, “You had to be able to skate and be a complete idiot, and I qualified on both counts.”
